member.name: T:CMS.WebAnalytics.Web.UI.CampaignConversionController
member.summary: Handles the campaign conversions.

member.name: M:CMS.WebAnalytics.Web.UI.CampaignConversionController.Post(CMS.WebAnalytics.Web.UI.CampaignConversionViewModel)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the corresponding to the given . The is inserted into database with the values obtained from .
member.remarks: If conversion with the same name and activity already exists within campaign, no action is performed and exiting conversion is returned.
member.param: Instance of view model with conversion information. This instance will be used to create corresponding
member.returns: HTTP status code 400 Bad Request, if model state of bound is not valid; otherwise, HTTP status code 200 OK with serialized .

member.name: M:CMS.WebAnalytics.Web.UI.CampaignConversionController.Put(CMS.WebAnalytics.Web.UI.CampaignConversionViewModel)
member.summary: Updates existing instance of the corresponding to the given . The is updated in database with the values obtained from .
member.remarks: If conversion with the same name and activity already exists within campaign, no action is performed and original unchanged conversion is returned.
member.param: Instance of view model with conversion information. This instance will be used to update corresponding
member.returns: HTTP status code 400 Bad Request, if model state of bound is not valid; otherwise, HTTP status code 200 OK with serialized .

member.name: M:CMS.WebAnalytics.Web.UI.CampaignConversionController.Delete(System.Int32)
member.summary: Deletes the given campaign conversion.
member.remarks: When response is returned, there will be no conversion with given ID in the database. HTTP verb DELETE is not supported, therefore this request accepts only GET requests.
member.returns: Returns HTTP status code 200 OK if request is successful.

member.summary: Gets page according to and .
member.param: Page node ID or product node SKUID.
member.returns: HTTP status code 400 Bad Request, if page is not found; otherwise, HTTP status code 200 OK with serialized view model.

member.name: M:CMS.WebAnalytics.Web.UI.CampaignConversionPageController.Get(System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets list of pages for current site, where current user has read permission.
member.param: Index of the page. Pages are indexed from 0 (first page).
Number of results in the page.

member.returns: HTTP status code 400 Bad Request, if model state of bound is not valid; otherwise, HTTP status code 200 OK with serialized .

member.name: M:CMS.WebAnalytics.Web.UI.CampaignObjectiveController.Delete(System.Int32)
member.summary: Deletes the given campaign objective.
member.remarks: When response is returned, there will be no objective with given ID in the database. HTTP verb DELETE is not supported, therefore this request accepts only GET requests.
member.returns: Returns HTTP status code 200 OK if request is successful.

member.summary: String to put into HTML to JavaScript code before substitution resolving.

member.summary: Registers script which logs banner hit asynchronously.

member.summary: Registers script which logs search hit asynchronously.
member.param: Page where script should be registered

member.name: M:CMS.WebAnalytics.Web.UI.WebAnalyticsServiceScriptsRenderer.Init
member.summary: Binds to appropriate events, so that LogHits call can be rendered on every page request.

member.name: M:CMS.WebAnalytics.Web.UI.WebAnalyticsServiceScriptsRenderer.RegisterLogHitsCall(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Registers script which logs page views and other hits asynchronously. The script is registered without the actual parameters. There is a placeholder at the location where parameters would be and this placeholder should be replaced by the actual parameters before sending page output to the client browser. This two-step rendering is required, because of the output cache mechanism. At first, there is a universal script rendered and

member.name: M:CMS.WebAnalytics.Web.UI.WebAnalyticsServiceScriptsRenderer.ShouldInsertAnalyticsJS(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Checks whether the JavaScript logging snippet should be added to the page.

member.name: M:CMS.WebAnalytics.Web.UI.WebAnalyticsServiceScriptsRenderer.ResolveSubstitution(System.Object,CMS.OutputFilter.SubstitutionEventArgs)
member.summary: Resolves JavaScript parameters substitution macro. Substitution macro is used because of full page caching, JavaScript snippet is unique for each visitor, because of the Url Referrer parameter.
